reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant with cute pearl and rhinestone straps and nice sparkles, while also appreciating its perfect fit and flattering shape that hides belly roll. Moreover, the dress is comfortable, stretchy, and offers good value for money. However, opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs a bit big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress
items.body: I bought this in red with the sparkly material. It is not overly sparkly, just right. The red is a true red. I'm 118 lbs and I normally wear a size small and the small fit perfectly. The hem is also perfect with heels, maybe just a touch too long, I'm 5'4". The straps are adjustable which is important. The material is stretchy and the overlap material in the front is good for my not perfect stomach. And I received it within a couple days. I would recommend it- Read more
items.author: dancer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this dress, but my stomach doesn’t :(
items.body: First off, this dress is gorgeous. The color/print is stunning, the material is nice and silky, I adore the neckline. But if you’re like me and you have an apron belly, it’s gonna show in this dress :( I included pics of myself from each side and from the front. I don’t think the sides are too bad, but I definitely notice my belly in the front picture, and that’s posed with tight shapewear on. I think it’s partially because of the placement of the ruching/crossover on my stomach. I’m 5’5” 210lbs 38DD and I’m usually a size 14 in dresses and 12 in jeans. I’m wearing size large here and it fits like a glove and is very stretchy. Straps are also adjustable. If you’re in between sizes, size down. I also tried this dress in the sparkly black size XL and I prefer how the large fits. Unfortunately I’ll be returning because it doesn’t flatter my body type, but if I lose 50 lbs I’ll be RUNNING back here to reorder this. Ordered a couple more dark colors hoping they’ll be a bit more forgiving. Definitely give it a try! Read more
items.author: Emily Lojewski

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly nice! Dark blue velvet is too dark, though.
items.body: I tried this in XL in my quest for a jewel-toned bridesmaid dress. I tried lots of different brands at different price points from different retailers, and I was very surprised that this one was as nice as the ones that I tried from the bridesmaids' website that begins with "L." The cut and ruching were extremely flattering, even on my "mom bod," and the velvet had a nice weight to it. Unfortunately, the dark blue velvet looked almost black in person--too dark for my needs. Also, the XL was too large for me, but that was my fault for not being brave enough to order it in my true size (L). (I'm not used to wearing such fitted dresses and thought that I would be more comfortable sizing up. Order your regular size!) Finally, the slit is a little too high for a formal event like a wedding. I will keep this dress in mind if I ever want a full-length gown for a sexy date night. For reference, I'm 5'4", 161 lbs, 32DDD (US), size 12 (US), and the XL was too large for me in the bodice. I have a feeling that the L would have been perfect if I had decided to go with this dress. Also, I was pleasantly surprised that the length wasn't so excessive that I would need to have it hemmed. I was stepping on it when I tried it on without shoes, but I think that 2-to-3-inch heels would have been fine with it. Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress - blew me away!
items.body: This dress was perfect, right out of the bag. No wrinkles or creases. I got navy blue velvet in medium, as suggested by size chart. I was on the upper end of the chart (37-29-39) but the dress fit like a glove without being too tight. It looks slimming. I'm 5'6" & it looks perfect with 3" heels. I could go with a higher or lower heel, but I'm happy with the dress length for me. The fabric is soft & luxurious. The color is a deep, dark navy that looked black in the package, but when you put it on, the dark blue shade is evident & very rich looking. I tried it on without a bra & it's fine if you don't like wearing one. It also works with a strapless bra (at least the one I have), which I prefer for the support. The only negative is the straps. They are very thin and delicate. They appear to be well sewn and look sexy on the dress but I hesitate to hang it by the straps. I want to avoid excess wear on them & decided to turn the dress inside out and fold it over a hanger. For the price, I'm super impressed. I'm wearing it with gold shoes, gold bag & jewelry - I think it looks like a million bucks. You could definitely style it with black or silver accessories but I just have gold & they work beautifully. Read more
items.author: Judy Jewels

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, looks like starlight
items.body: This dress fit me well. I ordered by the waist size, since I’m more of an apple shape. I’m 5’8, 203lbs, 40DD, and have a 39” waist; I ordered an XXL. The dress skims my body without being too tight but there is a little stretch to it. It’s also the perfect length to go with heels. I love the color; I purchased the black with the silver strands the glitter like starlight. The straps are cute pearl and rhinestone. I found the dress to be very comfortable and the fabric to have a nice weight to it; it definitely didn’t feel thin and cheap. If I could change one thing on it, I would add hanging loops on the inside to hang it up. The straps are stretchy and feel like they will stretch out of shape if you hang the dress by them. So I am hanging it with a trouser hanger that has clips at either end. Read more
items.author: Lightsaber princess

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Delivered too late for what I bought it for, but it's beautiful
items.body: Giving 3 stars because it was delivered late. I ordered it on a Tuesday, 2 day shipping, to arrive Thursday for an event i had on Friday night. Shipping then got delayed until Friday. When I checked tracking on Friday, it was being delivered between 6pm and 10pm. I was set to leave at 530pm. I held out hope it might get here in time, but at 3pm I had to run out to a local mall to hurry to get a gown in time for my event, which i then ended up being a few minutes late for. My dress wasn't delivered until 7pm Friday night. Luckily i had found a last minute gown to save the night. If you can't deliver in the time you promise, don't promise it. However my Amazon driver did a great job delivering it and making sure it was in a safe place until I got home, and the gown itself is beautiful and fits perfectly. I was going to return it since the event i purchased it for is over, but decided to keep it for the next one. Since i can't trust delivery time. But again, the dress is lovely and well made. Just buy it with extra time for delivery. Read more
items.author: Catherine DiDesidero

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to wear and flattering
items.body: Very flattering I’m a bit overweight right now and this dress is very slimming although the photo isn’t the best angle to tell. Material once pressed seems like it won’t wrinkle easily and it was stretchy and comfortable Read more
items.author: Tiffani Simmons

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Bodycon Maxi Formal Cocktail Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Bodycon Maxi Formal Cocktail Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green and Velvet Floral, Sparkly Dark Red, Sparkly Dark Red-d, Sparkly Royal Blue-b, Black Velvet, Green Knit, Shiny Black Beaded, Sparkly Navy Blue-b, Black and White Geometric, Khaki Knit, Light Purple Plaid, Yellow Stripes Knit, Leopard Print, Dark Red Velvet. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
